name: multibeast
description: A React-based web application for planning and processing Comms Team coverage during the Aspen Ideas Festival. Written in React + Express + MongoDB and much ❤️.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.staging: concurrently "node app.js" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.poststart: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Gabe Salkin
